title: Close to everything far from ordinary! Live near it all!
neighborhood: Arvada - Olde Town Arvada / Westminster / Wheat Ridge
posting_body: ['Foothills Park - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 1 / Bath: 1', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 606 sq ft', 'Rent: $1887 - $2140/Month', 'Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', 'In an effort to decrease the spread of COVID-19 we ask that you wear a mask while visiting the premises.', 'Tucked away in the heart of Arvada, Foothills Park offers renovated studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes that define luxury.', 'Foothills Park boasts beautiful mature landscaping, open court yards, a sparkling pool and bbq pits!', 'Our property is a short drive away from I-70, with easy access to Wheat Ridge, Golden, Westminster, Broomfield and Downtown Denver!', 'Each of our well-appointed homes feature wood burning fireplaces, private patios or balconies, in home washers and dryers and individual water heaters.', 'We also offer vaulted ceilings in select units!', "Stop by for a tour today and see why Foothills Park is Arvada's favorite place to call home!", 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '✓ Air Conditioner', '✓ Disposal', '✓ Extra Storage', '✓ High Ceilings', '✓ In-Home Washer/Dryer', '✓ Large Closets', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Skylight', '✓ Wheelchair Access', '✓ Wood Burning Fireplace', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '✓ Accepts Electronic Payments', '✓ Bilingual', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Courtyard', '✓ Grill', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Pet Friendly', '✓ Pool', '✓ Public Transportation', '✓ BBQ/Picnic Area', '✓ Beautifully Landscaped Grounds', '✓ Carport', '✓ Easy Access to Wheat Ridge, Golden, Westminster, Broomfield and Downtown Denver', '✓ On-Site Maintenance', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Plenty of Shopping, Entertainment and Dining Nearby', '✓ Shopping Within Walking Distance', '✓ Short Drive Away From I-70', '✓ Sparkling Swimming Pool', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '9855 W 59th Ave', 'Arvada, CO 80004', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed,', 'No Max weight, One time Fee Per Pet $300.00, Pet Rent Per Pet $35.00', 'Comments:', 'Foothills Park is a pet friendly community.', 'No Weight Restrictions.', 'Breed restrictions apply, please contact our office for details.', 'Pet fees range from 300 to 600.', 'Near Wheat Ridge, Golden, Lakewood, The Highlands, Westminster, and Boulder.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '4C50C83E104B43DA']
